abstractText: Weight values are needed to calculate reproductive effort (green egg mass weight / whole body weight) and size at age calculations for broodstock. See Reintroduction of Lower Columbia River Chum Salmon into Duncan Creek FFY 2008 to 2010 Summary Report for more (https://pisces.bpa.gov/release/documents/documentviewer.aspx?doc=P123791
title: Weights: adult sampling at hatchery v1.0
